NPCResponse: Outpost Rush is a 20 vs 20 match that takes place on a large island with three Outposts.\nPlayers compete to capture and hold these Outposts for as long as possible, increasing their team's score in the process.

You can tell a fishing hotspot is active when you see fish jumping out of it. While it's active, landing your cast within the hotspot will yield quicker bites and rarer fish. When you place your line correctly, you'll see a small alert telling you you've hit the hotspot. After enough fish are caught at a hotspot it will become depleted. You can tell a hotspot is depleted when there are no fish jumping. A depleted hotspot will become active again after some time has passed. As your fishing skill improves, you will be able to find more and better hotspots.
